lines.text: Maybe... maybe he couldn't cast the spell.
Maybe he has those <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> tattoos, and we just can't see them under the robe!
What? No. We can see he has Go Wizard tattoos.
Exactly! What if he tried to get both kinds of magic, somehow?
If he had both sets of tattoos, they might interfere with each other and stop him from being able to cast!
...That's kind of a big if, kid. And we can't check, anyway.
Anyway, I don't think it's all that complicated.
